channel.title: Need help with barrage

item.title: Need help with barrage
item.dc:creator: @fr000b fr000b
item.description:
@fr000b wrote:

ok so i have ice barrage in my server and i want to make it non mutli if you could help it would be awsome heres the code i have for barrage

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { hitDiff = misc.random(30); startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(369, 40, 5); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); castOnPlayer.Teleblock(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 2; stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!"); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

Read full topic
